text: First comes love, then comes real estate? — Justin Bieber and Selena Gomez are reportedly shopping around for a home in CA, weeks after reuniting! They ’ re hoping for a ‘ long life together, ’ a new report claims! Jelena seems to be on the fast track to a happily ever after! Justin Bieber, 23, and Selena Gomez, 25, are looking to buy their first home together, Life & Style reports. “ It was Selena ’ s idea, and Justin is all for it, ” a source tells the mag. “ He ’ s already looking at homes in the Calabasas, CA area. They just can ’ t wait to start their life together. ” The mag alleges that purchasing their first home together “ is the beginning of what they hope will be
